text: a high-profile trial pitting one of the
world's most recognizable pop stars
against a local DJ when David Muller
from Denver lost his job he blamed
Taylor Swift for ruining his career the
singer's mother and manager had
contacted his radio station bosses to
report that he groped the singer at a
photo shoot he sued Swift for three
million dollars
she countersued for the assault which he
described in court as a very long grub
under her skirt it was a very shocking
thing she said that she'd never
experienced before last week the judge
threw out mr. mother's lawsuit saying
the DJ hadn't shown that Swift
personally set out to have him fired but
her case against him continued and the
jury sided with the pop star she had
been assaulted and in keeping with her
wishes mr. Muller was ordered to pay a
dollar in damages in a statement Swift
thanked the judge and her legal team for
fighting for her and anyone who felt
silenced by a sexual assault she said
she wanted to help those whose voices
should also be heard it gets courage and
inspiration to all people not just women
but to all people to have the courage to
draw lies and to know where those lines
are the lines of mutual respect between
people Taylor Swift who's one of
America's top selling singers said in
future she'd be making donations to
multiple organizations that help sexual
assault victims defend themselves he
deposed DBC News Los Angeles
